bosniyan yuddhaya yanu 1992-1995 athara kalaya thuladi bosniya saha harsagowina thula sidu wu awi gath gatumaki. 1992 mul bhagaye di sidu wu p rachanda k riya gananawakata pasuwa, 1992 ap rel 6 dina yuddhaya aarambha wu bawa podu piliganimayi.
